00069                 public function diario_comment_discard()
00070                 {
00071                         if ($this->request->is_get())
00072                         {
00073                                 if (!empty($_GET['id']))
00074                                 {
00075                                         $this->comment = new DiarioComment();
00076                                         $this->comment->find_by_id($_GET['id']);
00077                                 }
00078                         }
00079                         else
00080                         {
00081                                 if (!empty($_POST['id']))
00082                                 {
00083                                         if (is_array($_POST['id']))
00084                                         {
00085                                                 foreach ($_POST['id'] as $id)
00086                                                 {
00087                                                         $comment = new DiarioComment();
00088                                                         $comment->find_by_id($id);
00089                                                         $comment->delete();
00090                                                 }
00091                                         }
00092                                         else
00093                                         {
00094                                                 $comment = new DiarioComment();
00095                                                 $comment->find_by_id($_POST['id']);
00096                                                 $comment->delete();
00097                                         }
00098                                 }
00099                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'diario_moderation_queue'));
00100                         }
00101                 }

00116 
00121                 public function diario_post_add()
00122                 {
00123                         global $db;
00124                         
00125                         if (isset($_POST))
00126                         {
00127                                 $post = new DiarioPost($_POST);
00128                                 $post->author = $_COOKIE['_u'];
00129                                 $post->save();
00130                                 
00131                                 // Delete old tags (if any)
00132                                 $db->prepare('DELETE FROM `diario_posts_tags` ' .
00133                                                 "WHERE `post_id` = '{1}'",
00134                                                 $post->id);
00135                                 $db->exec();
00136                                 
00137                                 // Save tags
00138                                 $tag_tokens = explode(',', $_POST['tag']);
00139                                 $tag_tokens = array_map('trim', $tag_tokens);
00140                                 $tag_factory = new Tag();
00141                                 foreach ($tag_tokens as $tag_token)
00142                                 {
00143                                         if (empty($tag_token))
00144                                         {
00145                                                 continue;
00146                                         }
00147                                         $tag_results = $tag_factory->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`tag` = '{$tag_token}'"));
00148                                         if (count($tag_results) > 0)
00149                                         {
00150                                                 $tag = $tag_results[0];
00151                                         }
00152                                         else
00153                                         {
00154                                                 $tag = new Tag();
00155                                                 $tag->tag = $tag_token;
00156                                                 $tag->save();
00157                                         }
00158                                         $db->prepare('INSERT IGNORE INTO `diario_posts_tags` ' .
00159                                                 '(`post_id`, `tag_id`) ' .
00160                                                 "VALUES ('{1}', '{2}')",
00161                                                 $post->id,
00162                                                 $tag->id);
00163                                         $db->exec();
00164                                 }
00165                                 
00166                                 // Expires the cache of Diario
00167                                 $this->expire_cached_page(array('controller' => 'diario', 'action' => 'index'));
00168                                 $this->expire_cached_page(array('controller' => 'diario', 'action' => 'last_posts'));
00169                                 $this->expire_cached_page(array('controller' => 'diario', 'action' => 'read', 'id' => $post->id));
00170                                 // Expires the cache of Diario feed
00171                                 $this->expire_cached_page(array('controller' => 'feed', 'action' => 'diario'));
00172                         }
00173                         $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'diario_post_list'));
00174                 }
00175

00434                         if (!isset($_REQUEST['id']))
00435                         {
00436                                 $_REQUEST['id'] = 0;
00437                                 $this->artifacts = $artifact_factory->find_all(array('order_by' => '`file` ASC, `priority` DESC'));
00438                         }
00439                         else
00440                         {
00441                                 $this->release = new SoftwareRelease();
00442                                 if ($this->release->find_by_id($_REQUEST['id']) === FALSE)
00443                                 {
00444                                         $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'software_list'));
00445                                 }
00446                                 $this->artifacts = $artifact_factory->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`release_id` = '{$db->escape($_REQUEST['id'])}'", 'order_by' => '`priority` DESC'));

00679                 public function server_error_read()
00680                 {
00681                         if (!isset($_REQUEST['id']))
00682                         {
00683                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'server_error_list'));
00684                         }
00685                         $this->error = new ServerError();
00686                         if ($this->error->find_by_id($_REQUEST['id']) === FALSE)
00687                         {
00688                                 $this->flash(l('No such element!'), 'error');
00689                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'server_error_list'));
00690                         }
00691                 }
00692                 
00697                 public function server_error_next()
00698                 {
00699                         global $db;
00700                         
00701                         if (!isset($_REQUEST['id']))
00702                         {
00703                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'server_error_list'));
00704                         }
00705                         $err = new ServerError();
00706                         $errors = $err->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`id` > '{$_REQUEST['id']}'",
00707                                 'limit' => 1));
00708                         if (count($errors) < 1)
00709                         {
00710                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'server_error_list'));
00711                         }
00712                         $this->error = $errors[0];
00713                         $this->render(array('action' => 'server_error_read'));
00714                 }
00715                 
00720                 public function server_error_previous()
00721                 {
00722                         global $db;
00723                         
00724                         if (!isset($_REQUEST['id']))
00725                         {
00726                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'server_error_list'));
00727                         }
00728                         $err = new ServerError();
00729                         $errors = $err->find_all(array('where_clause' => "`id` <= '{$_REQUEST['id']}'",
00730                                 'limit' => 1));
00731                         if (count($errors) < 1)
00732                         {
00733                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'server_error_list'));
00734                         }
00735                         $this->error = $errors[0];
00736                         $this->render(array('action' => 'server_error_read'));
00737                 }

00743                 public function server_error_delete()
00744                 {
00745                         global $db;
00746                         
00747                         if (!empty($_GET['id']))
00748                         {
00749                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'server_error_read', 'id' => $_GET['id']));
00750                         }
00751                         else
00752                         {
00753                                 if (!empty($_POST['id']))
00754                                 {
00755                                         if (is_array($_POST['id']))
00756                                         {
00757                                                 $db->prepare('DELETE FROM `server_errors` ' .
00758                                                         "WHERE FIND_IN_SET(`id`, '{1}') " .
00759                                                         'LIMIT {2}',
00760                                                         implode(',', $_POST['id']),
00761                                                         count($_POST['id'])
00762                                                         );
00763                                                 $db->exec();
00764                                         }
00765                                         else
00766                                         {
00767                                                 $error = new ServerError();
00768                                                 $error->find_by_id($_REQUEST['id']);
00769                                                 $error->delete();
00770                                         }
00771                                 }
00772                                 $this->redirect_to(array('action' => 'server_error_list'));
00773                         }
00774                 }

00780                 private function expire_cached_software_pages()
00781                 {
00782                         // Expires the cache of Software & Sparkle feeds
00783                         $this->expire_cached_page(array('controller' => 'feed', 'action' => 'software'));
00784                         $this->expire_cached_page(array('controller' => 'sparkle', 'action' => 'index', 'id' => $_POST['software_id']));
00785                         $this->expire_cached_page(array('controller' => 'software', 'action' => 'widgets_versioncheck', 'id' => $_POST['software_id']));
00786                         $this->expire_cached_page(array('controller' => 'software', 'action' => 'changelog', 'id' => $_POST['software_id']));
00787                         $this->expire_cached_page(array('controller' => 'software', 'action' => 'releasenotes', 'id' => $_POST['software_id']));
00788                 }
00789                 
00795                 private function _batch_moderate($table_name)
00796                 {
00797                         global $db;
00798                         $has_deleted = FALSE;
00799                         
00800                         if ($this->request->is_post())
00801                         {
00802                                 $query_preamble = 'SELECT 1 ';
00803                                 if (isset($_POST['delete-selected']))
00804                                 {
00805                                         $query_preamble = "DELETE FROM `{$table_name}` ";
00806                                         $has_deleted = TRUE;
00807                                 }
00808                                 else if (isset($_POST['moderate-selected']))
00809                                 {
00810                                         $query_preamble = "UPDATE `{$table_name}` SET `approved` = 1 ";
00811                                 }
00812                                 
00813                                 if (is_array($_POST['id']))
00814                                 {
00815                                         $db->prepare($query_preamble .
00816                                                 "WHERE FIND_IN_SET(`id`, '{1}') " .
00817                                                 'LIMIT {2}',
00818                                                 implode(',', $_POST['id']),
00819                                                 count($_POST['id'])
00820                                                 );
00821                                         $db->exec();
00822                                 }
00823                                 else if (isset($_POST['id']))
00824                                 {
00825                                         $db->prepare($query_preamble .
00826                                                 "WHERE `id` = '{1}' " .
00827                                                 'LIMIT 1'
00828                                                 );
00829                                         $db->exec();
00830                                 }
00831                                 if ($has_deleted)
00832                                 {
00833                                         $db->prepare("OPTIMIZE TABLE `{$table_name}`");
00834                                         $db->exec();
00835                                 }
00836                         }
00837                 }
00838         }
